title: Your Fundamental Rights
summary: Overview of constitutional rights every citizen should know.
content: Citizens have rights such as freedom of speech, equality before law, and protection from discrimination. This lesson explains the basics and how to claim these rights.

title: Consumer Protection Basics
summary: How to handle faulty goods, refunds, and consumer courts.
content: If a product is defective, you have the right to file a complaint, request a replacement or refund, and approach consumer forums. Keep receipts and document communications.

title: Online Safety & Privacy
summary: Protecting personal data and recognizing scams.
content: Learn practical steps to protect your data online, recognise phishing, and report cybercrime to relevant authorities.
